moc.title: CRANKSHAFT: ALLOY STEEL
moc.data: Crankshaft is made of nitrated, hardened and precision ground for extremely long life and durability.

moc.title: MAIN BODY (CRANK CASE): SPHEROIDAL GRAPHITE IRON
moc.data: Main body in spheroidal graphite iron casting with honned surface finish bore.

moc.title: PISTON (CROSS HEAD): GREY IRON & STAINLESS STEEL
moc.data: Alloy steel casting piston & stainless steel piston rod are hardened & super finish surface.

moc.title: CONNECTING ROD: ALLOY STEEL
moc.data: Forged steel connecting rods with antifriction bearings. Heavy pin area construction, for added load strength.

moc.title: BEARING:
moc.data: Oversized for maximum life and load distribution.Self alignment roller bearing enables it to handle 26% more load than other pumps.

moc.title: PUMP HEAD: STAINLESS STEEL
moc.data: Liquid end is made of high corrosion resistant forged Stainless Steel 304.

moc.title: COMPLETE VALVE: STAINLESS STEEL
moc.data: Valves made stainless steel for hardened & anti corrosion hard surface coated for long life.High volumetric efficiency valves operate at 96% efficiency plus.

moc.title: PLUNGER: CERAMIC / TUNGSTEN COATED
moc.data: Primarily composed of ceramic coated or Tungsten coated. Surface roughness is extremely good i.e. <0.2 Ra. (99.5% Alumina Grade)

moc.title: PLUNGER SEAL: PTFE ARAMIDE
moc.data: Aramide fibre yarn packing with PTFE fibre face or carbonaceous aramide yarn packing with GFO fibre face for high compressive & tensile strength ensure effective sealing.

moc.title: WHITE METAL BEARING:
moc.data: Antifriction bearings for long life of crankshaft.

moc.title: HELICAL GEAR: ALLOY STEEL
moc.data: Helical gear is nitride hardened and precision ground for extremely long life and durability.

moc.title: PINION SHAFT: ALLOY STEEL
moc.data: Pinion shaft is nitride hardened and precision ground for extremely long life and durability.

techDetails: Inlet Pressure Min. / max: 2 to 3 bar (Booster pump flow require min 1.5 times of rating flow)
Max. Liquid Temp.: 70 DEG. C (160 DEG. F)
AMTTPP Series: Designed in built Gear
notes: Maximum permissible fluid temperature is 70 Deg.C

Power calculations shown in the table are based on maximum related pressure; however, for low pressure requirements, power will also be proportionally reduced. Pump speed lower than the specified chart is also available for special applications.
Volumetric efficiency is considered @100% when not specified.
